name: ReMoDDeD
savepath: This is one of the larger updates in the mod and improves many aspects including new items, recipes, bug fixes and other improvements. I've spent many hours on this particular update, so I hope you guys can enjoy all the changes. Due to the amount of changes, I strongly recommend reading up on the changelogs in Discord for important info. Enjoy the mod!

D2RLaunch will be the new method for customizing and starting our mod. It has all the same features as before, but now is available to all mods and players. Please be patient as bugs are ironed out, and as always thanks for your support and patience as things are improved.
